response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value to us, reflecting years of innovation and expertise. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This opportunity not only represents a substantial saving but also an investment in quality and excellence. I look forward to discussing how this product could benefit you and potentially revolutionize your experience. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this special offer.", "product_price": 750000}
